About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Fri 9am-4pm; closed school summer holidays. General reference assistance and copying services available. Introductory brochure available.

About.Access: 1 day's advance notice of visit required including details of topic of research. Proof of identity required. Access to records not usually available for research can be gained by authorisation from the Archivist.

About.Acquisition focus: The history and heritage of Scotch College and all members of the Scotch family eg. students, teachers, past students, parents and school staff. (99% in-house).

About.Major holdings:
Scotch College: Photographs c1870- ; Admission Registers 1857-; School history 1851- 
	School masters 1851- ; Roll Books 1857- ; Ledgers 1857- ; School Magazines 1877- ; School Papers 1971- .
